Preterit.text: Aʕ ʕwone  šridi bǝṯr u ḥmoro. Our sheep followed the donkey. (İlyas p.c)
Di naqla d Čalabiyo ǝzzewa lu ḥarb, mǝšrodiwa maṯe zlamat bǝṯre. Each time Čalabiyo went to war two hundred men followed him. (İlyas p.c)
Hedi šridi lu=mal di=arʕo. Then they went after the riches of the land. 2018_07_08_au_003_NE_1F;259 (about the pillage of a village in Sayfo)
